<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eerie Environs](/Feats.aspx?ID=3764) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 65</row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7); Trained in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

The natural world can be scary to those not used to it—and you make it scarier still. If you're hidden from a creature, you can attempt to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) it without losing your [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) condition— imitating the sounds of strange beasts or causing the foliage to rustle menacingly. When you do so, you don't take a penalty to your check if the target doesn't understand your language.
name: Eerie Environs
prerequisite: Trained in Intimidation; Trained in Stealth
